Articles.Content:
Hello!

I'm going to start development a resource customizer module. The module will provide a posibility inserting a user custom icon for staging, for example.

As you can see it works perfect (real screen from my test game, icon has changed for each engine)

But I'm not sure that it actually. What do you think about? If you have another proposials, please write it in this thread. and I will prepare development plan for me based on your proposials.

Thanks!

Edited September 18, 2014 by belpyro
change thread name
perfect timing! something i have been looking for recently....I already made some icons, but did not find a suitable ( non replacing) method to use them :-)
This is a neat little add-on, would be nice to see some polish!

At the very least, the option of having a different icon for boosters, regular engines, air-breathers, separation assists, etc. would be amazing. Having the ability to customize the icons for anything that is able to be staged would be extra sweet.

One big usage with this plugin is that we can use different icons for launch-escape-system' SRBs, separatron-type SRBs and Big-BOOOOOSTER SRBs and it will help a lot either when adjusting the staging in VAB/SPH or in flight.
Thank's all for your opinions! Then I start to develope this mod ))

I thought this would be a replacer for stock icons and I'm a little disappointed.

I'm just worried that the difference in icon styles might end up a bit jarring.
